content: {"name": "CHARITY BAPTIST CHURCH", "alternate_name": "", "description": "The Food Pantry is open each week unless otherwise noted for holidays or vacations on the Facebook page or posted on the exterior door of the Food Pantry. \n\nhttps://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=100062665279517", "email": "", "url": null, "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "2420 Brantley Road", "address_2": null, "city": "Kannapolis", "state_province": "NC", "postal_code": "28083", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 35.4931063, "longitude": -80.5833129}, "phones": [{"number": "(704) 938-7664", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "13:15", "closes_at": "14:30"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "22:45", "closes_at": "23:30"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Client can visit: Once a week "}]}
